00018 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE ServiceRepositoryListener::DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( unsigned int flags, const DnsSdService& ServiceInfo )
00019 {
00020     if ( flags & OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00021     {
00022         // A new service appear
00023         // AS this *ù## gcc do not want to create a reference on "on the fly" constructed objects
00024         // construct it first
00025         ServiceProxy LocalSP( ComTools::GeneratePeerId(), ServiceInfo.HostName, ServiceInfo.Port, (ServiceProperties &)ServiceInfo.Properties );
00026
00027         ServiceAdded( LocalSP );
00028     }
00029     else
00030     {
00031         // A service disappear
00032         // AS this *ù## gcc do not want to create a reference on "on the fly" constructed objects
00033         // construct it first
00034         ServiceProxy LocalSP( ComTools::GeneratePeerId(), ServiceInfo.HostName, ServiceInfo.Port, (ServiceProperties &)ServiceInfo.Properties );
00035
00036         ServiceRemoved( LocalSP );
00037     }
00038 }
